item.description:
Hello Friends of Freedom,

We are planning now to protest at Fed locations around the country.

There are many groups doing this. We are protesting either at the New York or Boston Fed. I am the leader of the Fed protest in Boston.

The main group we're organizing through is www.restoretherepublic.net . Sign up there and go to these locations:

Also, there's an End the Fed Meetup: http://www.meetup.com...

Sign up for whichever group you'd like.


Information on the New York End the Fed Rally
Nov 22
Sat 12:00 PM
Location
NY Federal Reserve Bank
33 Liberty St
New York, NY 10045

Rally to Support Sound Money and Free Markets! End the
unconstitutional Federal Reserve!
No more bailouts! No more banker robbery of We the People.
We must let people know exactly what is leading us down our
road to serfdom. This is the kickoff in a series of outreaches
to educate the public
Rally at the NY Fed at the South Side of Liberty and Nassau.

See you there, forward to all members!

William Wallace

Information on the Boston End the Fed Rally:

10 AM, Saturday, November 22 (We'll start setting up between 9 -10 AM. Some will meet around South Station or in the Food Court.)

Federal Reserve Bank
600 Atlantic Ave
Boston, MA 02205

Jim Azzola
item.name: End the Fed Protest - Boston or New York
